articles.title: India@100 could be as rich as America and China, says Mukesh Ambani - Economic Times
articles.description: Destiny and Drive are making the 21st centurys favourite nation ready for a great leap forward. India stands at the doorstep of prosperity that is both significant and inclusive, and of delivering all-round human development through the democratic route.

articles.title: Novel therapeutic agent could be effective for treating cancers with certain gene mutations - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Mount Sinai researchers have developed a therapeutic agent that shows high effectiveness in vitro at disrupting a biological pathway that helps cancer survive, according to a paper published in Cancer Discovery, a journal of the American Association for Cance…
